title: Three Hunter Borders?
body:
I purchased the hunter Icon. But that's it. Are three borders added as well? 

Greetings

replies.body: On Vi, Jhin and Vayne u get the little Triangles in the Skin Showcase
The Borders are automatically added once u bought the specific skins.
Do you know how to equip them? :/

automatically.
They are always and forever on your loading boarder in the loading screen when you use the skin.
I don't know how to equip them too D:
